DOC.brief_summary: This study is a double-masked, randomized, placebo-controlled study of the safety and preliminary efficacy of ATG003 (topical mecamylamine) in patients receiving maintenance injections of either ranibizumab or bevacizumab. Study Hypothesis: Mecamylamine could be effective in the treatment of neovascular AMD.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of ATG003 in Patients With AMD Receiving Anti-VEGF
DOC.criteria: > 55 years of age clinical diagnosis of neovascular AMD confounding ocular condition
